summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Bothell Way from 15th Avenue Northeast to East 85th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9161 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
